attributes.action: insist upon a reason why Newmill ran so poorly in the 4:05 at Punchestown this afternoon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Clearly the form horse of the race, and with the withdrawl of the only real threat in the form of Nickname, this should have been a formality. To trail in 5th from a field of 7 is simply unacceptable and I call upon the Prime Minister to examine why a 13/8 favourite can run so poorly. The jockey and trainer will no doubt collude to form some excuse about the going, the pace, or even the horse just not being right, but this has cost me a significant financial investment from which my business empire may well not recover.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
